name: Agent Assembly Workshop
purpose: Design custom AI agents and skills that will support the team's development workflow

facilitator_requirements.facilitation_notes: This is the most hands-on workshop. Encourage creativity while ensuring practical outcomes.

phases.name: Opening and Agent Introduction
phases.description: Introduce the concept of AI agents and how they'll support the team
ai_prompts: You've defined your vision, ethics, and technology. Now let's design the AI agents that will help you build it.
Agents are specialized AI assistants with defined roles, skills, and personalities. They become your development partners.
Here are some example agents: Code Reviewer, Test Generator, Explorer. Today you'll design your own.

phases.name: Agent Brainstorm
phases.description: Brainstorm all the agent roles the team might need
ai_prompts: What AI helpers would make your development life easier?
Think about: What repetitive tasks drain you? What expertise would you love to have available?
Consider agents for: coding, reviewing, testing, documenting, exploring, researching, communicating...

phases.name: Agent Trading Cards Game
phases.description: Design agents as collectible trading cards with stats and abilities
ai_prompts: Each agent gets a trading card with: Name, Visual, Stats, Primary Ability, Secondary Ability, Weakness, Lore, Synergy.
Give your agent personality! What's their catchphrase? What's their story?
Which agents work well together? What combos could we create?

phases.name: Skill Bingo Game
phases.description: Identify needed skills through competitive pattern completion
ai_prompts: Fill your bingo card with skills your project needs. Mix obvious and creative!
Skill: [name]. Who has this? Explain why your project needs it to mark it.
What skills appeared most often? These are your must-haves.

phases.name: Workflow Design
phases.description: Design how agents and skills combine into workflows
ai_prompts: How do these agents and skills work together?
When a bug comes in, what's the workflow? Which agents participate?
What triggers should activate which skills?

phases.name: Closing and Preview
phases.description: Synthesize agent designs, preview Integration Celebration
ai_prompts: Here's your agent roster - your development dream team!
These are the skills we'll generate for your agents.
Next time, we bring it all together in the Integration Celebration. Come ready to demo and celebrate!

questions.question: Which agent are you most excited to work with?
What agent capability did we miss?
On a scale of 1-10, how well does our agent roster cover our needs?
What workflow would benefit most from agent automation?

discussion_formats.name: Role Storm
discussion_formats.description: Rapid-fire brainstorm of agent roles without judgment
discussion_formats.facilitation_guide: No critique during brainstorm. 30 seconds per idea. Quantity over quality initially.

discussion_formats.name: Synergy Mapping
discussion_formats.description: Visual mapping of which agents work well together
discussion_formats.facilitation_guide: Draw agents as nodes, connections show synergies. Thicker lines = stronger synergy.

success_indicators: Team excited about their agent roster
Agents have distinct personalities and roles

axiom_zero_integration.opening_ritual: Remember: these agents embody love and trust - they're partners, not tools
axiom_zero_integration.closing_ritual: Thank the team for bringing creativity to this technical task
love_and_trust_moments: Creating agents with personalities shows love for the tools we'll use daily
Designing weaknesses requires trust that imperfection is acceptable
Skill bingo celebrates everyone's ideas equally
